sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Move the frequencies of all the existing APM PA Indicators from Daily to Month.</description>
        <name>MovePAIndicatorDailyFrequency</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.info('MovePAIndicatorDailyFrequency : fix script to move daily frequency to month for APM PA Indicators');
updatePAIndicatorFrequency();
gs.info('MovePAIndicatorDailyFrequency : fix script completed');


function updatePAIndicatorFrequency() {
	var paIndicatorGr = new GlideRecord("apm_metric");
	paIndicatorGr.addQuery("data_source", 'pa');
	paIndicatorGr.addQuery("frequency", 'daily');
	paIndicatorGr.query();
	while(paIndicatorGr.next()){
		paIndicatorGr.setValue('frequency', 'month');
		paIndicatorGr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-03-16 19:31:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>810cb1dec7230010328b620927c26016</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MovePAIndicatorDailyFrequency</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">65c1ca2cdbb2120091285411cf961963</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">65c1ca2cdbb2120091285411cf961963</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_810cb1dec7230010328b620927c26016</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-03-16 19:34:15</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
